Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png'}
{3: 'The roaring wind eases into stillness, and the biting cold slowly slips away from their skin.'}
{3: 'The long story ends abruptly, like a play that drops its curtain halfway, leaving chaos in its wake.'}
{3: 'In the darkness, the final light flickers off, and the countless dancing digits vanish in an instant, plunging everything into silence.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory922.jpg'}
{3: 'Sitting calmly in the middle of the room, the figure shows no hint of attachment. With a single snap of the fingers, the delicate sand city on the tray crumbles away entirely.'}

{3: "It's a remarkably detailed digital model of a city, each grain of sand representing every rock, every blade of grass, every tree—each packed with so much data that ordinary people could never process it all."}
{3: 'All of it is meant to flawlessly replicate "that city."'}
{3: 'Since an experiment has taken place, every conceivable variable needs to be meticulously checked from start to finish.'}
{3: 'By precisely logging and recreating reality—while ensuring no external interference pollutes her database—she sticks to her established operating principles.'}
{3: 'This time, however, she runs into a rare dilemma.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory190.png'}
{1: '1', 2: '??', 3: 'Even with the "Projector" at her side, keeping a firm grip on so many people\'s actions and thoughts at once is out of the question.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '??', 3: 'Hmm... to explore other potential outcomes involving the special subject, I need to build it all again.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Fine sand converges beneath her open palm, and the same intricate model reappears on the tray, exactly as it was before.'}
{3: "Still, it's not just a straightforward copy."}
{3: 'The creator takes all the variables from the last experiment and weaves them into this sandy metropolis, like the grooves on a vinyl record.'}
{3: 'It\'s the same "city" as before, but in many ways, it\'s also entirely new.'}
{3: "Still, it's running under the very same strict laws as last time."}
{3: 'The stinging frost, the snowfall that fills the sky, the bone-chilling wind...'}
{3: 'Every grain of sand, every rock, each plant and tree is magically computed and called onto the stage, piece by piece.'}
{3: 'Countless flecks of light dance across the tabletop, as if breathing a soul into the clay, poised to revive this city once more.'}
{3: 'Until she sees a glimmer of fulfillment, this fleeting cycle will never end.'}
{1: '1', 2: '??', 3: 'Come on, "Projector". We can\'t afford to rest if we want them to achieve their best outcome.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She fixes her gaze on the human seated across from her, a slight smile on her lips and a compelling magic in her eyes.'}
{2: '??', 3: 'I need your cooperation to make all of this a "reality."', 4: '1'}
